text: BI-LO was an American supermarket chain. It was owned by Southeastern Grocers, headquartered in Jacksonville, Florida. At the time of the bannerâ€™s elimination, BI-LO operated in Georgia, South Carolina, and North Carolina. It was founded in 1961, and ceased operations in 2021. title: BI-LO (United States)
